channel.title: Development Guides on Lander
channel.description: Recent content in Development Guides on Lander

item.title: Development Guide
item.description: Get familiarized with the development workflow of the project. Installing Dependencies All dependencies in the project are managed through NPM, including Hugo. To install the dependencies, open a command line at the root of the project and run: $ npm ci To avoid package compatiblity issues, use Node version 12.x. Hot Reload Servers Hot reload development servers can be launched for the demo site, the documentation or storybook. Demo Runs a development server of the demo site while watching the theme with Webpack.
